project.name: Maven Enforcer Plugin, Custom Rule: Property Usage
project.description: Maven Enforcer Plugin (org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-enforcer-plugin) custom rule: Ensure that all the Java properties defined in resources .properties files are also used in code.

developer.name: Mikko Koivunalho
developer.email: mikko DOT koivunalho CATTAIL iki DOT fi

requireProperty.regexMessage: Property 'project.basedir' must contain at least one character.
"Project version must end in a number or -SNAPSHOT."
